articles.author: Christian Borjon Valencia
articles.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD edges high on US Dollar weakness, ahead of US CPI - FXStreet
articles.description: Gold price encounters some buyers and rises some 0.30% on Monday, late in the New York session, amidst overall US Dollar (USD) weakness, sponsored by a drop in US Treasury bond yields.
articles.content:
• Gold prices (XAU/USD) see a modest increase of 0.30%, trading at $1944.95, influenced by the weakening US Dollar and declining US Treasury bond yields.
  • The market's focus is on the up… [+2146 chars]
